product_name: West Paw Bumi Dog Toy - Large
long_description: The West Paw Bumi is a toy your dog won't want to put down! Pull, flex, throw, stretch and float-Bumi does it all for hours of fun with your pooch. 100% recyclable Zogoflex(R) material means Bumi will never need to be thrown in a landfill. Soft yet durable material gently rubs clean your dog's teeth but won't absorb odor or water. Floats for easy retrieval and visibility. Comes in assorted colors only; sorry, specific color requests cannot be accommodated.
short_description: The West Paw Bumi is a toy your dog won't want to put down! Pull, flex, throw, stretch and float-Bumi does it all for hours of fun with your pooch.
